post.body: Where did everything go?  Everything is now blank, no users, no posts, nothing.

For some reason, my user.json file got erased and I had to create a new username.  I think it was my AV that was forcing Zeronet to shut down which probably caused an issue.  Be careful if you use Vipre AV and whitelist zeronet.exe.
Facebook blocks Minds.com and calls it "unsecure" after Facebook gets hacked losing 30 million users info...  Interesting.

Just got notice that the Xbox 1 is now BC compatible with Crysis.  So now we can officially state that the Xbox 1 can run Crysis.  Next question is, can it run it well?  Somebody else will have to find out because I already 1k'ed it.
Canceled my 18 year old Paypal account considering what they did to Gab.  It's ridiculous what tech companies are doing.

comment.body: Got it, Had to delete ZeroMe and then find it again and have it redownload everything.  For some reason checking for updates or checking files didn't do anything.

@Tardfighter: I agree, that's why I'm here and not there.  Just hypocritical, they at least could have been honest and just said it was a competitor and they don't promote their competitors or something along those lines.
